msbt.message: Hey there, kiddo!
! Pay attention!
Well, if it ain't ...
How are ya, ?
Thanks for the letter, and the present was nice enough too.
Yer present was real nice. I look forward to figurin' out what it is.
I'm grateful for both the card and present, each for their own reason.
Dunno what I did to earn a gift from ya, but I like it all the same.
Thanks for the letter and for the gift too. Real darn nice!
Hey, ever look out your window and think, "Boy oh boy, those knuckle- heads are at it again today."
Just sittin' here thinkin' about how my hometown had a lotta trains, but no tracks. What was that about?
Ya ever think about how a bajillion years 'o evolution came up with you? Pretty neat, yeah?
You know, a lotta folks ask why I'm always cranky. It's a rude question! I AIN'T ALWAYS CRANKY!
Hey, random question. Do I seem like the sorta crank who'd call his letters "missives"? Sure hope not!
Hey, write me again soon, OK?
Gahaha! I crack myself up.
Did what I say make sense?
Come over sometime soon!
You get what I mean, right?
Over and out. –
Whatever. Bye. –
– (but you knew that)
Gotta go now,
Adios, kiddo. –
